<a id="ThemeDB"></a>

# ThemeDB

**Inherits:** [Object](Object.md)

A singleton that provides access to static information about [Theme](Theme.md) resources used by the engine and by your project.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This singleton provides access to static information about [Theme](Theme.md) resources used by the engine and by your projects. You can fetch the default engine theme, as well as your project configured theme.

\ **ThemeDB** also contains fallback values for theme properties.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Signals

<a id="ThemeDB_signal_fallback_changed"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**fallback_changed**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#ThemeDB_signal_fallback_changed)

Emitted when one of the fallback values had been changed. Use it to refresh the look of controls that may rely on the fallback theme items.

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="ThemeDB_property_fallback_base_scale"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **fallback_base_scale** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#ThemeDB_property_fallback_base_scale)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_fallback_base_scale**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_fallback_base_scale**\ (\ )

The fallback base scale factor of every [Control](Control.md) node and [Theme](Theme.md) resource. Used when no other value is available to the control.

See also [Theme.default_base_scale](Theme.md#Theme_property_default_base_scale).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ThemeDB_property_fallback_font"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Font](Font.md) **fallback_font** [ðŸ”—](#ThemeDB_property_fallback_font)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_fallback_font**\ (\ value\: [Font](Font.md)\ )
- [Font](Font.md) **get_fallback_font**\ (\ )

The fallback font of every [Control](Control.md) node and [Theme](Theme.md) resource. Used when no other value is available to the control.

See also [Theme.default_font](Theme.md#Theme_property_default_font).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ThemeDB_property_fallback_font_size"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **fallback_font_size** = `16` [ðŸ”—](#ThemeDB_property_fallback_font_size)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_fallback_font_size**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_fallback_font_size**\ (\ )

The fallback font size of every [Control](Control.md) node and [Theme](Theme.md) resource. Used when no other value is available to the control.

See also [Theme.default_font_size](Theme.md#Theme_property_default_font_size).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ThemeDB_property_fallback_icon"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **fallback_icon** [ðŸ”—](#ThemeDB_property_fallback_icon)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_fallback_icon**\ (\ value\: [Texture2D](Texture2D.md)\ )
- [Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **get_fallback_icon**\ (\ )

The fallback icon of every [Control](Control.md) node and [Theme](Theme.md) resource. Used when no other value is available to the control.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ThemeDB_property_fallback_stylebox"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[StyleBox](StyleBox.md) **fallback_stylebox** [ðŸ”—](#ThemeDB_property_fallback_stylebox)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_fallback_stylebox**\ (\ value\: [StyleBox](StyleBox.md)\ )
- [StyleBox](StyleBox.md) **get_fallback_stylebox**\ (\ )

The fallback stylebox of every [Control](Control.md) node and [Theme](Theme.md) resource. Used when no other value is available to the control.

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="ThemeDB_method_get_default_theme"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Theme](Theme.md) **get_default_theme**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#ThemeDB_method_get_default_theme)

Returns a reference to the default engine [Theme](Theme.md). This theme resource is responsible for the out-of-the-box look of [Control](Control.md) nodes and cannot be overridden.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ThemeDB_method_get_project_theme"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Theme](Theme.md) **get_project_theme**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#ThemeDB_method_get_project_theme)

Returns a reference to the custom project [Theme](Theme.md). This theme resources allows to override the default engine theme for every control node in the project.

To set the project theme, see [ProjectSettings.gui/theme/custom](ProjectSettings.md#ProjectSettings_property_gui/theme/custom).
